channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Baltimore man accused of killing tech CEO pleads guilty to attempted murder in separate case
item.description: A man charged with killing Baltimore tech entrepreneur Pava LaPere last September has pleaded guilty to attempted murder counts in a separate arson and home invasion case just days earlier that left two people seriously injured.

item.title: Indianapolis man, 19, convicted of killing 3 young men found dead along a path
item.description: A 19-year-old man has been convicted in the fatal shootings of three young men whose bodies were found along a path in Indianapolis.

item.title: Arizona home fire kills 2, including a child, and injures 3
item.description: Authorities say two people are dead and three others in critical condition after a home fire in a Phoenix suburb.
